title: The Tournament of Tiers
goal: Artie must win the tournament brackets without taking a single point of damage.
stakes_shift: Artie becomes a public icon, making him a primary target for the System's 'balancing' algorithms.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is the underdog in the arena.
bridge.to_next: Artie reaches the finals against Vane, who has rigged the game.

sections.title: The Round of 32
sections.intent: Show Artie's growth and tactical use of his crits in the arena.

scenes.summary: Artie faces a 'Tank' who has 10,000 HP. Artie wins in one second by critting the Tank's belt buckle, causing his armor to fall off and disqualify him.
scenes.outcome: The crowd goes wild; Artie is the 'One-Hit Wonder'.

scenes.summary: The System tries to nerf Artie mid-match by introducing 'Wind Resistance'.
scenes.outcome: Artie has to learn to time his punches with the wind gusts.

scenes.summary: Artie wins the second round by critting the air so hard it creates a vacuum, sucking his opponent out of the ring.
scenes.outcome: Artie moves to the quarter-finals despite mid-match System nerfs.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie moves to the quarter-finals despite mid-match System nerfs.

sections.title: The Quarter-Finals: The Mirror Match
sections.intent: Artie faces a character with high evasion, forcing a change in strategy.

scenes.summary: Artie's opponent is a 'Dodge-Build' rogue who also has low HP.
scenes.outcome: The fight becomes a high-speed game of tag.

scenes.summary: Neither can land a hit for ten minutes. The crowd starts booing.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes he needs to change his strategy.

scenes.summary: Artie uses his 'Participation Trophy' to lure a swarm of arena-flies, which distract the rogue just long enough for a crit.
scenes.outcome: Artie wins, but the 'Trophy' is now glowing with dark energy.

scenes.summary: The System issues a 'Warning' to Artie for 'Unsportsmanlike Exploitation'.
scenes.outcome: The System applies a 'Random Debuff' to Artie for his next match.
scenes.end_condition_echo: The System applies a 'Random Debuff' to Artie for his next match.

sections.title: The Semi-Finals: The Debuff
sections.intent: Artie must overcome a mechanical handicap (Inverted Controls).

scenes.summary: Artie's debuff is 'Inverted Controls'. Every time he tries to move left, he goes right.
Artie's opponent is a Mage who uses AOE spells. Artie has to 'moonwalk' through the fireballs.
scenes.outcome: Artie manages to reach the Mage and lands a crit that turns the Mage's staff into a rubber chicken.

scenes.summary: The Mage surrenders out of pure embarrassment.
Vane watches from the wings, holding a 'System Override' scroll he bought from the black market.
scenes.outcome: Artie reaches the finals against a rigged Vane.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie reaches the finals against a rigged Vane.
